modName: Lore Friendly Uthgerd The Unbroken In Enhancement
summary: Aims to make Uthgerd seem like a more believable character by making her look more youthful and healthy. No longer will an old woman haul loot across the province but a fearsome younger Uthgerd!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=4]Uthgerd The Unbroken﻿[/size][/u][/b][/center]Uthgerd the Unbroken! A fierce warrior with great strength and brilliant skills in battle which rival those of the mighty companions! Its just a shame she looks so weak and frail hardly able to carry her armour and the [b][i]ENDLESS [/i][/b]burdens the Dragonborn makes her haul across the vast expanse of skyrim! This mod takes Uthgerd back a few years so she looks like she is in her mid to late twenties rather than looking like the frail fifty year old woman she is vanilla.
Ceolwulff's Lore Friendly follower enhancement mod series aims to make suttle changes to the appearance of the character to make them seem more believable and fitting to their character (This case a fearsome young warrior with a fiery spirit) without making the character look vastly different.

[b][u]What Will this Mod Do?
[/u][/b]
1. This will make Uthgerd Look Like a more capable warrior by making her look younger and healthier (Removed Wrinkles and sagging facial features that makes her look like an old granny)

2. Makes Uthgerd Look slightly more attractive and feminine while still making her look like her vanilla self.

3. Keep details such as a massive scar (from vanilla) on her character.

[b][u]What Wont this Mod Do?

[/u][/b]1. Make Uthgerd Look Booti-licious! Changes the appearance of her face only!

2. It will not add details that were not on Vanilla Uthgerd The Unbroken (Make-up, additional scars, beards or accessories etc.)

3. Change any textures.

[center][size=4][b][u]
How Do I install this Mod?﻿
[/u][/b][size=2]Just download it through the Nexus Mod Manager! No seriously its that simple unless you feel like doing it manually...
In that case just extrace the .rar and drop the .esp your data folder!
[/size][/size]
[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
This Mod Will work with any mods that change textures of things such as eyes, skin hair etc. but will not work
with mods that change the appearance of Uthgerd herself, if you are using another mod that overhauls the appearance
of Uthgerd simply overwrite the previous mod.

[b][u][size=4]NOTES[/size][/u][/b]
This is my first mod so please be gentle but feel free to leave criticism if you feel the mod can be improved or if you run into
any bugs or issues! If you have any requests for an alternate version with war paint, hair etc. just let me know and I will see what I can do for you!
This is re-uploaded from the account I had shut down due to me wanting to have a new account and is by the same author (Me! Previously SuperEvilTea).
[size=4][size=2]
[/size][/size]


[b][u][size=4]

author: Ceowulff
